title: The Nine Servants of Sauron (1U219)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Nazgul, you may exert a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer).
Lore:	”'That Black Rider was looking for something … or someone - Frodo?'”
Rarity:	U
